summary: AN ORDINANCE amending the Election Campaign Contributions Ordinance to change reporting times and contents of reports, raise the exemption for reporting individual contributions to $25.00, require retention of certain records, authorize interim investment of campaign funds, establish a civil assessment for late filing, and make other changes; amending Seattle Municipal Code Sections 2.04.010, 060,160,170, 180, 220, 230, 250, 260, 270, and 500 (Ordinance 106653 S 3, 16, 4, 5(a), 7, 9, 10, 11, and 21 respectively) adding two new sections; and repealing Section 2.04.190 (Ordinance 106553 & 58).
